attributes.action: Pressure the Brazillian authorities regarding the unjust sentencing of scientist Marc van Roosmalen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Dutch scientist has received an absurd 16 year prison sentence for the following  "Van Roosmalen was convicted of holding an Internet auction for the naming rights of two monkey species he discovered. He planned to use the proceeds to help preserve their habitats. But the court ruled the auction was illegal because van Roosmalen was working at Brazil's National Institute for Amazon Research at the time of the discoveries and said the naming rights belonged to the government. "
